articles.title: 'They gave us freedom' - D-day veterans celebrated in Normandy - BBC.com
articles.description: Colourful events are taking place to commemorate D-Day, but the ongoing conflict in Ukraine casts a shadow of war over Europe.
articles.content:
Katya Adler,BBC Europe Editor
Surviving D-Day veterans, including Steve Melnikoff, have been the star attraction in Normandy this week
Its impossible not to be swept away by the warmth and energy i… [+6808 chars]
